channel.title: Murion 666 | Hiscores | Vote4Reward | Automated Store | Fully Skillable
channel.description:
[center] [img]https://murion.org/new/images/logo.png[/img]
Murion is a revived scratch framework semi-economic server with content dating back to 2011 September; eventually planned to turn into a 2 world (1 half spawn (plans to be announced later), 1 complete economy) in the future. We feel that the development process and establishing a genuine community coincide with one another, after-all our aim being to fill the gap for a relevant 2011 server that attracts and hooks every type of RSPS player. The entire framework is built around a core master server, which mainly processes but is not limited to login requests and communication packets with integration to our website.
[size=13pt][b]Note[/b]:[/size] [size=12pt]You must register on our forums and use the same login information to access game.[/size]
[url=http://www.murion.org/]Click to visit our website![/url] [url=http://www.murion.org/application/client.jar]Click to download our client![/url]
[CENTER][SIZE=5][Latest Update Notes][/SIZE] [B]Update Log: 09/06/2015[/B] - Redid player save and loading format - Fixed some packet issues between master & game server - Fixed the packet spam issue when server throws an exception - Fixed an issue with Grand Exchange offer abort - Fixed the error connecting to server bug - Added daily logging system - Added NPCs in preparation for Slayer skill - Pollnivneach Slayer dungeon is now accessible ________________________________________________________________________ [B]Update Log: 09/03/2015[/B] - Fixed a bug with woodcutting inferno adze - Lowered the chance of receiving bird's nest from any tree - Fixed a few PvP bugs to do with diagonal interactions - Added the majority of slayer dungeon spawns along with the rogues den - Completely re-did saving - Added the yanille shortcut - Added ariane to the home along with rewards trader with own unique dialogues - Surgeon general tafani now sends you a message when healing and performs a visual animation - Made yell donator only - Fixed a weird bug with the Easter ring and ring of stone - Fixed a lot of the NPC attributes related to slayer NPCs in preparation for the release of slayer - Optimized client setting arguments[/CENTER]
[size=12pt][b]Current Features:[/b][/size] Banking, Movements and Communication Combat with weapon specials and etc. Friend Chat Cooking Firemaking Fishing Fletching Herblore Mining Runecrafting Smithing Thieving Woodcutting Global News Announcements Distinction Cape Recolouring Vote for Rewards Hiscores
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wdBHy1M.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/14o64vl.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/16bha1v.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/s63re9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/R4NI2cC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1wlRecK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xopEbDD.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KcUDlla.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/M9VakjD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kdFjHqv.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/i1a304M.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OWVXRVN.jpg[/img] [/center]

item.title: Murion 666 | Hiscores | Vote4Reward | Automated Store | Fully Skillable
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=5][Latest Update Notes][/SIZE]
[B]Update Log: 09/06/2015[/B]

  • Redid player save and loading format
  • Fixed some packet issues between master & game server
  • Fixed the packet spam issue when server throws an exception
  • Fixed an issue with Grand Exchange offer abort
  • Fixed the error connecting to server bug
  • Added daily logging system
  • Added NPCs in preparation for Slayer skill
  • Pollnivneach Slayer dungeon is now accessible

[B]Update Log: 09/03/2015[/B]

  • Fixed a bug with woodcutting inferno adze
  • Lowered the chance of receiving bird’s nest from any tree
  • Fixed a few PvP bugs to do with diagonal interactions
  • Added the majority of slayer dungeon spawns along with the rogues den
  • Completely re-did saving
  • Added the yanille shortcut
  • Added ariane to the home along with rewards trader with own unique dialogues
  • Surgeon general tafani now sends you a message when healing and performs a visual animation
  • Made yell donator only
  • Fixed a weird bug with the Easter ring and ring of stone
  • Fixed a lot of the NPC attributes related to slayer NPCs in preparation for the release of slayer
  • Optimized client setting arguments[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: Murion 666 | Hiscores | Vote4Reward | Automated Store | Fully Skillable

item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

[center]

Murion is a revived scratch framework semi-economic server with content dating back to 2011 September;
eventually planned to turn into a 2 world (1 half spawn (plans to be announced later), 1 complete economy) in the future.
We feel that the development process and establishing a genuine community coincide with one another,
after-all our aim being to fill the gap for a relevant 2011 server that attracts and hooks every type of RSPS player.
The entire framework is built around a core master server, which mainly processes but is not limited to login requests
and communication packets with integration to our website.

[size=13pt]Note:[/size] [size=12pt]You must register on our forums and use the same login information to access game.[/size]

Click to visit our website!
Click to download our client!

[CENTER][SIZE=5][Latest Update Notes][/SIZE]
Update Log: 09/06/2015

  • Redid player save and loading format
  • Fixed some packet issues between master & game server
  • Fixed the packet spam issue when server throws an exception
  • Fixed an issue with Grand Exchange offer abort
  • Fixed the error connecting to server bug
  • Added daily logging system
  • Added NPCs in preparation for Slayer skill
  • Pollnivneach Slayer dungeon is now accessible

Update Log: 09/03/2015

  • Fixed a bug with woodcutting inferno adze
  • Lowered the chance of receiving bird’s nest from any tree
  • Fixed a few PvP bugs to do with diagonal interactions
  • Added the majority of slayer dungeon spawns along with the rogues den
  • Completely re-did saving
  • Added the yanille shortcut
  • Added ariane to the home along with rewards trader with own unique dialogues
  • Surgeon general tafani now sends you a message when healing and performs a visual animation
  • Made yell donator only
  • Fixed a weird bug with the Easter ring and ring of stone
  • Fixed a lot of the NPC attributes related to slayer NPCs in preparation for the release of slayer
  • Optimized client setting arguments[/CENTER]

[size=12pt]Current Features:[/size]
Banking, Movements and Communication
